title: How i can block the function of turning off the mobile network on the locked screen?
content:
When my phone will be stolen, the thief can turn off the mobile network and wi-fi on the locked screen and all fucnctions of Find my phone, Delete all information and so on will be totally useless against it.
Sure, thief can also turn my phone off from the locked screen and again, i will can't find, block it and so on, which makes Google's security and loction absolutely dormant.
